tasks.title: Define Landing Page Structure
tasks.description: Outline the sections of the landing page, including header, main content, email capture form, and footer.

tasks.title: Design Visual Elements
tasks.description: Create a visually appealing design for the landing page, including color scheme, typography, and images.

tasks.title: Develop Email Capture Form
tasks.description: Implement an email capture form that collects user emails and integrates with the email marketing service.

trace.title: Define Landing Page Structure
trace.reflection: The landing page structure was effectively defined, ensuring a clear organization of essential sections that enhance user engagement and facilitate email capture. This structured approach lays a solid foundation for a successful landing page.

trace.title: Design Visual Elements
trace.reflection: The design for the landing page was successfully completed, effectively incorporating a cohesive color scheme, typography, and imagery to enhance visual appeal.

trace.title: Develop Email Capture Form
trace.reflection: The development of the email capture form was successfully completed, effectively integrating user email collection with our email marketing service. This enhancement will facilitate better engagement with our audience.
